item.description:
SWING


Tired of sitting and watching others dance and have fun at parties and weddings? Then learn the basics and look great on the dance floor. Come learn East Coast and West Coast Swing & enjoy the groovin' music of Pop, Rock & Swing Bands This one hour class is for all levels, beginners welcome. Partners are suggested but not necessary. Please wear comfortable clothes and shoes that can slide, no sandals. Class size is limited to 30.

Wednesdays 7-8pm
5 weeks only -Oct. 3, 10, 17, 24, Nov. 7
$60/person $95/couple

Classes located at:
Branford High School
185 E. Main St.
Branford, CT 06405

To register, please call 203.641.0691 or sign up online here
item.how_to_find_us: Go to front desk & ask Kris from security where class is
item.name: Swing Class
